body.name: 2024 New Version - 360° Dash Cam Front, Rear and Inside, 2 Channel FHD 2K+1080P Dash Camera for Car, Free 32GB SD Card, Dashcam with 3" LCD Super IR Night Vision, G-Sensor, Loop Recording
body.stockDetail: Only 9 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 mins
features: 🚗 [ 360° Rotating Dual Channel Coverage] - Equip your car with our 360° Rotating DashCam. Featuring FHD 1440P(Front)*1080P(Cabin) resolution, this 2 channel dash cam can simultaneously record front and inside views, offering all-round protection with its 170-degree front and 360-degree cabin coverage. With a 360° rotating lens that can be used to record the cab, the right side or both, this dash cam is a versatile 3-channel dash cam that perfectly captures every angle of driving activity.

🚗 [ Upgraded large 3” IPS Clear Display] - Our 3" IPS Screen Full HD 1440P*1080P dash camera for cars provides real-time footage and reduces blind spots with its 170° field view in the front. The superior resolution allows the capture of license plates and road conditions, keeping your driving record clear and detailed. The Screen made by IPS panel, It allows you to see a clear picture at any angle without any reflection or blurring.

🚗 [ Superior Night Vision] - Stay safe with our Infrared Night Vision Dash Cam. Designed with 6 IR LED lights and advanced night vision image sensor technology, the dash camera can capture clear and balanced video even in low-light conditions. Use it as a dual dash cam to record both front and rear views for complete coverage and protection.

🚗 [ Reliable Recording & Emergency Locks] - Equipped with Loop Recording and G-Sensor capabilities, this dash cam provides continuous recording, saving collision video upon sensing sudden shocks, and offering 24-hour parking monitoring. When the storage limit is reached on the memory card, new recordings will automatically overwrite the oldest recordings. Get this reliable dash camera and enjoy peace of mind while driving.

🚗 [ Easy Installation & Cost-effective] - This dash cam front and rear comes with a 32GB SD card and reader, making it ready-to-use. You do not need to buy SD card additionally. Its user-friendly design and plug-and-play installation process make it the perfect addition to your vehicle. Drive with confidence and stay protected with our dashcam!

🚗 [ Super After-sales & 24/7 Customer Support] - Drive with peace of mind knowing we've got your back. Our product comes with a 18-month warranty and round-the-clock customer service for any inquiries or concerns.
body.description: ✅Every camera is made to keep you safer! Take You into Safe Driving✅ We hope that our dash cam can provide an extra protection for your car. It can get you out of trouble when you need evidence.When you travel by car, it captures the scenery along the way for you. Whether it's design, functionality, accessories, we are committed to creating the high quality dash cams. Our dash cam is not only easy to use, but also helps you to clearly record your driving situation and beautiful journey.✅Support: WDR technology, Voice Recording, Motion Detection, Loop Recording, Photo Function✅Specification: Dual camera: 1440 Front Car Camera+ 1080P Cabin 360° CameraDisplay: 3 inch LCD screenStorage: Micro SD Card Up to 32GBVideo resolution: 1440 Front Car Camera+ 1080P Cabin 360° CameraViewing angle: 170-degree front and 140-degree cabin coverage(With a 360° rotating lens )Driving recorder Power: 5V / 2.1A G-Sensor: Off/OnLoop Recording: Built-in✅Product list: 1* 360° Dual Dash Cam1* Car Charger 1* 32G SD Card1*Tap Installation 1* SD Card Reader1 *User Manual ✅Why Choose our dash cam?✅Equipped with a 360° rotating, front and inside car camera, this product offers dual FHD 1440*1080P recording for a comprehensive coverage of your journey. Thanks to its Advanced Sensor and 6 IR LED lights, you'll never miss a moment even in low-light conditions. Also featuring an easy plug-and-play installation and a pre-inserted 32GB microSD card, this dash cam provides a user-friendly experience right out of the box. With Loop Recording, G-Sensor capabilities, and 24-hour parking monitoring, you can keep track of your driving activities effortlessly. We provide 24/7 customer support and a 12-month warranty, ensuring you always have assistance when you need it. Drive smart, safe and secure with our Multi-Channel Dash Cam.
